headline: New Curbside Delivery
paragraph: Miss physical library books? You can now request curbside pickup directly from our catalog!

headline: Expanded Chat Reference Hours
paragraph: Chat with a UI Librarian this summer 1pm - 4pm Mon-Fri. Ask usâ€”we're here to help with all your library questions!

image-alt: flowers in front of the library
headline: Library Services Go Online
paragraph: As part of the statewide response to COVID-19, the library building will be closed until further notice. We continue to offer extensive online resources. Please check our COVID-19 Page for up-to-date information.

headline: What Does Your Library Look Like?
paragraph: Explore our new My Library stories highlighting students and little-known library services.
